title: Rename login button to Admin Login

requirements.text: Update the top navigation authentication button label so that when the user is not authenticated it displays "Admin Login" (or "Admin Only") instead of "Login", while keeping the authenticated state label as "Logout" and the in-progress label as "Logging in...".

quotes: since I am the only user to login to the site ...can the login button say Admin login or Admin only instead of login

acceptanceCriteria: When not authenticated, the button rendered by frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton.tsx displays "Admin Login" (or "Admin Only") instead of "Login".
When authenticated, the button still displays "Logout".
While the login action is in progress, the button still displays "Logging in...".
No backend/Candid changes are made for this text-only change.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
nonGoals: Do not change authentication behavior, admin access control, or Internet Identity configuration.
Do not change any other copy beyond the unauthenticated login button label.
